source.statement: return new ResponseEntity("Response from Simple Controller. Received message: " + request.getParameter("message"), HttpStatus.OK);

sink.statement: return new ResponseEntity("Response from Simple Controller. Received message: " + request.getParameter("message"), HttpStatus.OK);

findings.description:
The user can send a message over a request parameter which is directly returned to the response body without proper sanitization.

curl http://localhost:8080/?message=alert(document.cookie);
